original_text: The rest of the deeds of Hezekiah and all his might and how he made the pool and the conduit and brought water into the city, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Judah?
korean_text: 히스기야의 남은 사적과 그의 모든 업적과 저수지와 수도를 만들어 물을 성 안으로 끌어들인 일은 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: The rest of the deeds of Hezekiah
how he made the pool and the conduit
and brought water into the city
in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Judah?
